headline: The Score: Apple, Palantir, Intel and More Stocks That Defined the Week
summary: Tech giants rallied Wednesday after Trump announced tariff exemptions for tech companies investing in U.S. production.  The announcement came at an event trumpeting Apple’s new $100 billion investment pledge.  Apple shares jumped 5.1% Wednesday.

raw.headline: The Score: Apple, Palantir, Intel and More Stocks That Defined the Week
raw.summary: Tech giants rallied Wednesday after Trump announced tariff exemptions for tech companies investing in U.S. production.  The announcement came at an event trumpeting Apple’s new $100 billion investment pledge.  Apple shares jumped 5.1% Wednesday.

headline: Earnings live: SoundHound AI stock soars, The Trade Desk tanks as Q2 earnings season starts winding down
summary: The gush of second quarter earnings reports is beginning to slow to a trickle, and with most of the reports in, the results have been mostly positive.

headline: Former Fugitive Advisor and CNBC Pundit Sentenced to 5 Years for Fraud
summary: James McDonald bet big on a massive market collapse after the 2020 election that never came to pass and then turned to fraud.

headline: McDonald’s Corporation (MCD): Analysts Are Focused On The Wrong Things,  Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Blasted China’s Hostility Towards The US. McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. headline: Wendy’s adopts McDonald’s chicken tender playbook, boosts beverages
summary: After an unfocused promotional calendar failed to boost sales, CEO Ken Cook said cold brew with cold foam and sparkling energy drinks will play a key role for the brand.
